title: ICE when using associated type in another assoc type's bound. 'assertion failed: did.krate != ast::LOCAL_CRATE'

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

body:
Testcase:

``` rust
#![feature(associated_types)]
#![crate_type="lib"]

pub trait Test {
    type Node;
    type Iter: Iterator<Item=Self::Node>;
}
```

ICE:

```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: did.krate != ast::LOCAL_CRATE', /home/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/slave/nightly-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/librustc/middle/ty.rs:5429
```
